channel.title: about on about me
channel.description: Recent content in about on about me

item.title: reading log
item.description: 2021 Designing data intensive applications: can’t recomend it enough. Programming Rust: Fast, Safe Systems Development: i love rust and this is a great book but afaik outside of all the (wonderful) cli tooling being built in rust, i see more interesting projects being built with go (if you could point me to some interesting rust projects, i would love to see them!). which led me to the my next book Learning Go: An Idiomatic Approach to Real-World Go Programming: the book is ok but as much as i try i can’t seem to get really excited about go.
